# # ServerError


```php
use Xendit\BalanceAndTransaction\ServerError;
```

## Properties

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Examples |
|------------|:-------------:|:-------------:|-------------|:-------------:|
| **status_code** | **float** | ☑️ |  | 500 |
| **error** | **string** | ☑️ |  | Internal Server Error |
| **message** | **string** | ☑️ |  | An internal server error occurred |
